title: Why is this
body: So every other jungle item has been reworked at least twice, but warriors has barely had anything done to it, and I feel its kinda dull compare to the others

replies.body:
>tiamat
holy shit.
me a weak 2017 adc derping about when suddenly
lee q lee dash CRESENT kick.
ded
me, literally anybody, rengar stuff CRESENT more rengar stuff
ded
and i dont know how i feel about 35% armor pen on every single ad jungler

Well...maybe some variety in jungle items? like 2 different upgrades for each class IE runglaive, and runic echos could be a choice for ap junglers, cinderhulk and juggarnaut (tenacity with bonus hp) could be one for tanks then like current warriors then new warriors with 10% increased bonus ad instead of 10% CDR, like have some variety with the items

jungle is the main issue with game balcne right now, why buff it so much?
it is supposed to be a simple cheap full item to help you with fighting and clear
Yeah, but why cant we get like a tiamat or a last whisper upgrade instead?

it got nerfed XD. thats all they did to it. to be fair its bland for a reason. its a jungle item. junglers want bland effective items because they work.
